price: Sema: Je, tukutajieni wenye khasara mno katika vitendo vyao?.
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Waambie hawa makafiri: Je, nikutajieni watu watao pata khasara mno kwa vitendo vyao na watao kosa thawabu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
